entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
